tool_description: Finally! RAG hashes input strings to make unique avatar images that you can use as profile pictures in web applications. You can replace default user images for new accounts, or you can enhance comment sections by visually representing your user's IP address or username.
name: Retro Avatar Generator
title: Retro Avatar Generator

api_list.name: Generate Avatar
api_list.description: Enter your seed string and you'll get back an avatar in PNG format.

required_parameters.name: seed
required_parameters.description: The seed value for your avatar generation.
